fullplot: Esha and Rahul start a letter based friendship that blossoms into love. They don't exchange names or pictures. Her parents would like Esha to marry Akshay who's eager to tie the knot, so Esha is forced to make a decision...
plot: A romantically inclined couple decide to get to know each other through letters without disclosing their identities.
title: Na Tum Jaano Na Hum
